author: cmchen
msg: * I've added an incubating disclaimer to the README file.
* I've removed the "temp" and "tmp" folders from the src distribution.
* That DynamicImport is indeed unnecessary; I've removed it.
* I've fixed the Bundle-Description and Bundle-DocURL properties of the manifest.

* I've modified the pom.xml to use custom assembly descriptors that I've checked in under src/assemble.  I've used them to a) remove the .bz2-compressed files. b) add the KEYS file to the bin distribution. c) hopefully added the javadocs to the binary distribution (I'm not sure this will work yet).
